title: Shot In The Foot: A Collection Of Eccentric Short Stories
description: A drunkard tries to conceal a gambling binge from his girlfriend. An online shopping addict receives a bizarre gift with unintended consequences. A negligent employee profits from a workplace cyberslacking application. “Shot In The Foot” depicts three outrageous tales of ugly vices and absurd situations. Each story focuses on the lives of self-destructive characters who act without restraint. Over the course of their misadventures, these characters are connected through a series of reckless decisions and an unwavering belief in the power of free will.
author: Michael Ryan Anderson
